title: In one state, a video gaming app for kids’ well-being is now covered by  Medicaid
itunes:title: In one state, a video gaming app for kids’ well-being is now covered by  Medicaid
itunes:author: Marketplace / Marketplace Tech Staff
description: As much as parents worry about children and screen time, there’s a growing market of video game-based apps designed to help kids work through their feelings. Now the Medicaid program in Wisconsin will cover the cost of at least one of those apps. We talked to a family in the state who tried it out.
